com.alternacraft.aclib.exceptions

Class PluginException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.alternacraft.aclib.exceptions.PluginException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class PluginException
extends Exception
    Custom exception. This add some extras:
    • Structured messages
      • There are three types:
        • Simplified. Just for indicating an error
        • Essential. Essential information to find a reason
        • Full. All the data
    • How to report
    • Functionality for finding a possible reason of the error
    Author:
    AlternaCraft
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
